summary: A new support and advice community has been created on Reddit. It's for anyone who needs someone to listen or in search of someone to vent to. It links to a website where people can ask for advice and support. It is not a professional.

text: I Have Surrendered My Life To The UniverseI have surrendered my life to the universe  I am not going to live my life without my wife  I love her so much  Either we are going to be together  or I am going to end my life  I am at peace with either outcome  The universe gets to decide my fate now  I think I have a lot more positivity and joy to spread in the world  but that s not my call anymore  It s in the universe s hands now  and I m ok with that Only a few days left  The sense of peace is surreal and beautiful  I am ready to go
summary: I have surrendered my life to the universe. I love my wife and I don't want to live without her. I have a few days left and I am at peace with either ending my life or being with her.
